xml.p: Introduction: "Have you met everyone in town yet? That sounds exhausting." #!String
Resort: "Wow, look at these structures!$h#$b#I can tell they were made by a master builder. I'm really impressed!" #!String
Resort_Leaving: "That was fun!$h" #!String
Resort_Shore: "Hey, look! I can see another island from here." #!String
Resort_Chair: "Hey @. You know, I was just thinking about how far the town has come since you first moved here.#$b#You should really be proud of all you've done!$h" #!String
Resort_Bar: "This is so relaxing..." #!String
reject_865: "Veggie salt? Sounds good, but I don't need it." #!String
reject_866: "Hmm... when I think of flowers, I think of Evelyn. Maybe show this to her?" #!String
pamHouseUpgrade: "Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy." #!String
pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: "Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy." #!String
MovieInvitation: "Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's show, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.$h" #!String
cc_Bridge: "Hey! I heard some weird noises last night, and woke up this morning to find the quarry bridge completely repaired!#$b#It's a miracle of woodworking!" #!String
cc_Complete: "I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, @... you were destined to be a town hero!$h" #!String
cc_Begin: "Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!" #!String
Mon: "Have I told you that I built our house from the ground up?#$e#It's definitely been the highlight of my career so far." #!String
Tue: "Hey, if you need any materials or blueprints, my shop is the place you're looking for!#$e#Plus, your business supports the local economy.$h" #!String
Wed: "Hey there, @.#$e#I was just daydreaming about some new carpentry projects.#$e#Are you doing OK at your place? How's the woodwork in your cottage holding up?" #!String
Thu: "You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't shopping, you know.$h#$e#It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains." #!String
Fri: "You've met my son Sebastian, right? He lives downstairs.#$e#He's a little shy, but I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him." #!String
Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: "I miss my Sebby... he was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in him." #!String

Fri4: "#$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me." #!String
Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: "Sebastian told me he's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of him." #!String
Sat: "Our house is in such a beautiful area, don't you think?#$e#I love the fresh air of the mountains." #!String
Sun: "I hope Demetrius doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of his.#$e#I'm not even sure what he's working on. I think it has something to do with plants." #!String

Sun2: "#$1 RobinDem#My husband almost set the house on fire last night with his science experiment. One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my husband's bizarre science project..." #!String
Sun6: "Hi @! It's good to see you.#$e#You're a regular member of the community now, don't you think?" #!String
event_wood1: "Great, then this blueprint should be a piece of cake for you!$h" #!String
event_wood2: "Well, then I have the perfect blueprint to get you started!" #!String
summer_Mon: "Wood is a wonderful substance... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has it's own unique character!" #!String

summer_Tue: "If you need any buildings on your farm upgraded, just ask me!#$e#You'll need to provide enough lumber and stone for the project. And it costs money, too.#$e#But I'm sure you'll be pleased with the results!$h" #!String
summer_Fri: "We're pretty insulated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.#$e#It has its pros and cons." #!String
fall_Mon: "#$1 RobinMaru#Maru likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and Maru getting along?" #!String
fall_Thu: "You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't in the market for a building upgrade!$h#$e#It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains." #!String
fall_Fri: "Have you met the wild man that lives behind our house?$s#$e#I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us." #!String
winter_Mon: "Hey, it's a perfect time of year to gather wood.#$e#Maybe you can collect enough to upgrade your house!" #!String
winter_Fri: "My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.#$e#They were pretty old-fashioned." #!String
winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: "I think the farm life is really healthy for Sebby." #!String
winter_Sat: "Our house is in such a beautiful area, don't you think?#$e#Everything looks still after a fresh snow." #!String
